title: Counting Coins
description: Master the art of counting money with the friendly Shopkeeper
npcGreeting: Hello there, young adventurer! Welcome to my shop! To buy things here, you need to know how to count your coins. Let me teach you!
npcFarewell: Fantastic work! You're becoming quite good at counting coins. Come back to my shop anytime!

questions.text: Which pile has MORE coins? Pile A has 3 coins 🪙🪙🪙, Pile B has 5 coins 🪙🪙🪙🪙🪙
questions.explanation: Correct! Pile B has 5 coins which is more than Pile A's 3 coins. Great counting!

questions.text: You buy a candy for 2 coins. You pay with 5 coins. How much change do you get back?
questions.explanation: Perfect! 5 coins - 2 coins = 3 coins in change. You're great at math!

questions.text: In my shop: An apple costs 3 coins, a cookie costs 2 coins. If you buy both, how many coins do you spend?
questions.explanation: Excellent! 3 coins + 2 coins = 5 coins total. You're a smart shopper!
